page.title: Super Mario Land 3 The Bad Influence

revision.text:
{{delete}} Super Mario Land 3 The Bad Influence is a Fantendo game on the [[Nintendo 3DS]] released in 2012 created by a wikia contributor. It is the third game in the Super Mario Land series. The gameplay is side view and it is one player. ===Story=== [[Wario]] is talking to [[Luigi]] complaining that Mario was given a land but neither him, Luigi, or Yoshi and how he tried to take over Mario Land twice. He then convinces Luigi to take over Mario Land and then after divide the kingdom into two to give Wario half a land. Luigi agrees with Wario and filled with jealously and rage that Mario got a land but not him. Meanwhile Mario is planning to return to the Mushroom Kingdom. Until Luigi and 7 clones barge in. They throw Mario on a catapult and Launch him to the other side of Mario Land. Mario must now go on a journey back to his castle to save his land from Luigi. Luigi also brainwashed the citizens by selling buckets then pressing a mind control button. ===Enemies=== [[Koopa Troopa]]s [[Koopa Paratroopa]]s [[Goomba]]s [[Paragoomba]]s [[Toad]]s [[Buzzy Beetle]]s [[Spiny]]s [[Para Buzzy Beetle]]s [[Para Spiny]]s [[Para Toad]]s [[Blue Koopa Troopa]]s(in underground levels]] [[Blue Goomba]]s [[Blue Para Koopa Troopa]]s [[Red Koopa]]s [[Shy Guy]]s [[Snifit]]s [[Blue Shy Guy]]s [[Yellow Shy Guy]]s [[Green Shy Guy]]s [[Blue Toad]]s [[Yellow Toad]]s [[Green Toad]]s [[Purple Toad]]s [[Orange Toad]]s [[Pink Toad]]s [[Cheep-Cheep]]s [[Green Cheep Cheep]]s [[Purple Cheep Cheep]]s [[Blooper]]s [[Crab]]s [[Sharks]] [[Lock ness Monsters]]
==Worlds== Each World has 8 levels the 8th being the World Boss. Here is a list of Worlds ===World 1 The Deep Forest=== A deep forest. The World Boss is [[Dark Green Luigi Clone]] ===World 2 The Plains=== The plains. The World Boss is [[Light Green Luigi Clone]] ===World 3 Mario River=== A shallow river full of fish. The world boss is [[Light Blue Luigi Clone]] ===World 4 The Mario Lake Shore=== Where the Mario River flows into Mario Lake. It is still shallow but more creatures like bloopers and crabs. The World Boss is [[Blue Luigi Clone]]. ===World 5 The Center of Mario Lake=== Away from the shore. In the middle of the wide lake. More creatures like Sharks are here. The World Boss is [[Dark Blue Luigi Clone]] ===World 6 The Deep Lake=== Deep below the surface of the center where it's very dark. More creatures like Lockness Monsters are here. The World Boss is [[Glowing Red Luigi Clone]] ===World 7 The Cave=== After finding a passage in the Deep Lake a cave appears. It is dark. The World Boss is [[Glowing Blue Luigi Clone]]. ===World 8 Luigi's Castle=== Formerly Mario's Castle until Luigi took over. The World Boss is Luigi. After you defeat him he cries and apologizes for all the trouble he caused. Mario forgives him and divides the land in half so Luigi can rule a half of the land. [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:Nintendo 3DS Games]] [[Category:2012]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:Super Mario Land]]
[[Category:UMG]]

{{delete}}Dark Land is Bowser's Kingdom. It has high volcanic activity. The [[Koopa Troopa]]s and [[Goomba]]'s live there. ==History== After [[Bowser]], the [[Koopa Troop]], [[King Koopa (Super Mario Bros. Super Show!)]], and the [[Koopa Pack]] attempted to overthrow the [[Mushroom Kingdom]]'s government in Super Mario Bros, The Super Mario Bros Super Show, and Super Mario 64 [[Princess Peach]] banished them to Dark Land. In the volcanic world Bowser and King Koopa made a deal and they formed two kingdoms. If you wan't to hear more about the kingdom King Koopa ruled until he died see [[Dark Land 2]].
==Government== The government is an absolute monarchy and Bowser has complete power to declare whatever he want's.
===Economy===
The major economy of Dark Land is joining the [[Koopa Troop]]. 50% of the male citizens join Bowsers army. They import their food and drinks from Subcon. The 50% of the males that don't join the army and the females get jobs like maintaining the money and selling food, drinks, toys and clothes. Many of their products including toys are made in U.C. In fact they are labeled "Made in U.C". ==Allies== ===Dark Land 2===
Up until [[Super Mario RPG the quest of koopa]] Dark Land 1 and Dark Land 2 were allies. Dark Land 1's [[Koopa Troop]] often joined forces with Dark Land 2's [[Koopa Pack]]. ==[[U.C. Empire]]== During the [[Mushroom Revolutionary War]] the Koopa Tribes and the Goomba's joined forces with the U.C army mainly because U.C treated them better. As I said earlier they get their food, drinks, clothing, toys, and other product from U.C. ==Enemies== ===Mushroom Kingdom===
Because of treating them badly for years Dark Land and the Mushroom Kingdom are enemies. They compete with the Mushroom Kingdom in Sporting events. However Bowser has a crush on the [[Mushroom King]]'s daughter [[Princess Peach]] so the grudge against the royal family is finally starting to settle down. However Peach doesn't like Bowser because he still is mean to the [[Mushroom People]]. [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Places]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Locations]]
[[Category:UMG]]

page.title: Super Mario Galaxy 3 The Grand Journey

revision.text:
{{delete|wat}} '''Super Mario Galaxy 3 The Grand Journey''' is the third Super Mario Galaxy game going to be released in 2013 on the [[Wii U]]. It was created by a wikia contributor who joined Fantendo. It can be 1 to 4 players. Player 1 is Mario but the others can choose who to pick. ==Story== [[Mario]], [[Luigi]], [[Wario]], and [[Waluigi]] are invited to the third star festival. They walk through Toad Town and enter the castle (which the inside has a similar look as it did in Super Mario 64). Mario goes to see Peach. Then all of a sudden there is a big crashing sound that brew a hole in the roof and knocked Mario out. Mario saw 8 airships. One was big and the other 7 were the mini ones the [[Koopalings]] used in New Super Mario Bros U. They were attacking [[Toad Town]]. Then chains drop from the airships as they lift up Peach's castle and take it to space. Mario stood there shocked. Then he walks around the Toad Town seeing the Toads panicking saying stuff like "Its Bowser and the Koopalings!" "Why [[Bowser]] why?! This is the third time you ruined our star festival!" Mario finds [[Baby Luma]] who explained that the comet observatory was attacked by 7 UFOs and it absorbed all the power stars and kidnapped his mama [[Rosalina]]. He then warps into Mario's cap and another luma transforms into a [[Launch Star]]. Mario launches into space. Then he goes through the first galaxy which is called the Rainbow Road Galaxy. After finding the first Power Star in the game it takes him to where a door of a starship opens. When Mario gets in the door closes. Then he finds a bunch of [[Luma]]s and an astronaut called (whoever the [[Mii]] you picked for your save file is). The Astronaut explains that the ship is called the Miiship and how a spiky dragon turtle on an airship attacked and stole the power stars from the ship. Then he or she thanks Mario for finding the first grand star. Then the Mii Captain drives the starship to where the 8 airships are in space. Mario then launches to get to the first airship. ==[[Larry Koopa]]'s airship== The first airship. You travel through it and battle Larry. You get the second power star the miiship needs. ==[[Morton Koopa Jr.]]s airship== The second airship. You travel through it and battle Morton. You get the third power star the Miiship needs. ==[[Wendy O. Koopa]]'s airship== The third airship. You travel through it and battle Wendy. You get the fourth power star the Miiship needs. ==[[Iggy Koopa]]'s airship== The fourth airship. You travel through it and battle Iggy. You get the fifth power star the Miiship needs. ==[[Roy Koopa]]'s airship== The fifth airship. You travel through it and battle Roy. You get the sixth power star the Miiship needs. ==This article is still under construction. Do not edit without my permission unless it's spelling and grammar. And don't worry the adventure Mario will do will be much bigger than this. I am still thinking of ideas== ==[[Lemmy Koopa]]'s airship== The sixth airship. You travel through it and battle Lemmy. You get the seventh power star the Miiship needs. ==[[Ludwig von Koopa]]'s airship== The seventh airship and the final one before Bowser's. You travel through it and battle Ludwig. You get the eighth power star the Miiship needs. ==Bowser's Airship== The final airship. Thats were you have to find the grand star. You travel through it and then you battle Bowser and [[Bowser Jr.]] After that you get the grand star. Then all of a sudden the Ufos Baby Luma described arrived. They absorbed the power stars and grand stars Bowser stolen from the Miiship. They also took Princess Peach. Bowser shouted at the aliens "Hey BACK OFF!!!!! Kidnapping Princess Peach is MY JOB!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" An alien voice from one of the Ufos said back "We need the Princess and we need to brainwash her to bake a cake so our boss [[Tatanga]] can use the cake she baked for his master plan. Ha Ha Ha Ha!". Then they suck up everyone exept Mario and launch lasers at the airships making everything fall in all directions. ==Planet Luma== Princess Peach's castle gets caught in the gravity of a planet called planet Luma. It then falls on another castle and destroys it. Then Mario finds a Luma crying. The Luma says "I am [[Prince Luma IV]] son of [[King Luma III]]. When that castle fell on the castle beneath it killed my sniff f f f father! Nooooooo Father Nooooooo!!! Then fury is in his eyes as he turns to Mario. "You will pay!" He shouted. Then there is a mini battle. After jumping on him 5 times Mario says something. Then Prince Luma IV said "Oh! Aliens atacked that castle and those airships in space! Sorry for accusing you of intentionally doing that. I bet Tatanga is behind all of this. One of our Luma spies traveled to his space station and came back reporting that Tatanga wants to kidnap the Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom because he wants to force her to bake a cake for him. I know it seems rediculous that an alien would order his henchmen to atack airships in space and kidnap a princess just for a cake but I think he has a much bigger plot. He wants her magical cake probbably because her famous magical cakes might help him complete his evil master plan. I don't know what his master plan is yet." Then Baby Luma comes out of Mario's cap. Then Prince Luma said "Oh is that.... is that Y Y Young Master Luma. Wait a minute! If you have the trust of Young Master Luma that means you have the power to breathe in space and save your special one. Master Luma how did you get here. Arn't you from Rosalina's comet observatory?". Baby Luma answered that the aliens attacked it, kidnapped his mother Rosalina, and stole the power stars and grand stars. Then Prince Luma finds the crown and puts it on his head. He said with a microphone to the Luma citizens of Luma city. "My people. I King Luma IV declare that I need help fixing this destroyed castle. Can you do it?" The Lumas cheer "Yeah!" They fix the castle and it was just as good as new. Peach's castle and the Miiship is fixed as well. Then King Luma IV explains "If you collect 70 stars that starhip will combine with your special ones castle and you can drive it to the center of the universe. That is where Tatanga's Spacestation is. You unlocked this room's launch star in your castle. Go in there. Once you 10 power stars there you can unlock the next room's launch star." Then the adventure began. Each world was unlocked in each room. The first room unlocked would bring you to World 1. Second to World 2. Third to World 3 and so on. Here are the Enemies. ===Goombas=== These are normally minions of Bowser but they got brainwashed to serve Tatanga. Spin to stun them then run into them. You can also jump on them to get a coin. ===Koopa Troopas=== These are normally Bowsers turtle footsoldiers. However they got brainwashed to serve Tatanga. Spin or jump on them to make them hide in their shells. You can pick up the shells and throw them. ===Shroobs=== These aliens originate from planet shroob. However after the defeat of [[Princess Shroob]] they were bribed to work for Tatanga. Spin them to stun them then fun into them. ===Octopuses=== These are aliens that worked for Bowser in Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2. However Tatanga brainwashed them to work for him. They shoot rocks out of their mouths. Spin them to get star bits. Jump on them to get a coin. ===[[Honey Bee]]s=== In the first two Mario Galaxies they help Mario. However in Galaxy 3 they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to get in the air then jump on them ===[[Penguin]]s=== In the first two Mario Galaxies they help Mario. However in Galaxy 3 they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then run into them to get star bits. Jump on them to get coins. ===[[Ztar Lumas]]=== Evil Lumas that decide to work for Tatanga. They try to spin at you. Spin at them at the right moment. ===[[Hammer Bro.]]s=== Koopas that throw hammers at you. Normally they work for Bowser but they got brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then jump on them. ===[[Boomerang Bro.]]s=== They throw socks at you. Normally they work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then jump on them. ===[[Fire Bro.]]=== They shoot fire at you. Normally they work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then jump on them. ===[[Ice Bro.]]===They shoot ice at you. Normally they work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then jump on them. ===[[Cheep-Cheep]]s=== These are fish that normally work for Bowser. However they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. They are in the water. Avoid them. ===[[Koopatrol]]s=== Knights in shinning armor that work for Bowser normally. However they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. They are in the UFOs. Avoid them. ===[[Paragoomba]]s=== Goombas that have wings. They normally work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Jump on them and they lose their wings. ===[[Paratroopa]]s=== Koopas that have wings. They normally work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Jump on them and they lose their wings. ===[[Giant Goomba]]s=== These are giant Goombas. They normally work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. Spin to stun them then run into them again to get star bits. ===[[Boo]]=== Ghosts that stick their tongues out. They normally work for either [[King Boo]] or Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. ===[[Giant Boo]]s=== Boos that are huge. Normally they work for either King Boo or Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. ===[[Bob-omb]]s=== Bombs that try to blow Mario up. Normally they work for Bowser but they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. You can pick them up and throw them. ===[[Pink Bob-omb]]s=== Basically the same thing as Bob-ombs except for the fact that they are pink and they normally help Mario. However they get brainwashed to work for Tatanga. ===[[Dry Bones]]=== Skeletons of dead Koopa Troopas. Normally they are servants of Bowser but they get brainwashed to be servants of Tatanga. They appear in UFOs. If you jump on them they fall apart. However a few seconds later they put themselves back together. [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:Super Mario Galaxy Games]] [[Category:Single Player]] [[Category:Multiplayer]] [[Category:Wii U Games]] [[Category:2013]]
[[Category:UMG]]

{{delete|'''Titan''' Koopas? All killed? ARE YOU SERIO- okay, this joke's getting old.}}The Titan Koopas were a tribe of Mutant Dragon Turtles that lived in the Mushroom Heavens. In the year 1983 they were all killed except for [[King Koopa (Super Mario Bros. Super Show!)]], [[King Koopa's mother]], [[Boom Boom]], [[Pom Pom]], and [[Bowser]]. ===History of the Tribe=== Millions of years ago there was a dragon named Orthonotor who lived in the Mushroom Heavens. Then he married a female Koopa Troopa and had a child named Hybridious who she died giving laying the egg of. Then Hybridious got married to a Koopa Troopa and had 11 kids. Then those 11 kids married random koopa troopas and had children. The process continued for hundreds of year until there was billions of mutant koopas. Then the mutants started to marry each other. Things went well until they rebelled against Toadstoolor the head Mushroom god. Then they got executed exept for Bowser who's egg fell off the edge. [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Groups]]
[[Category:UMG]]

{{delete}} Super Mario Bros 30th anniversary edition is a remake of the original 1985 Super Mario Bros. It is released in 2015 and celebrates the 30th anniversary of Super Mario Bros. The graphics are advanced into Wii U graphics and there are many cutscenes. It was created by a wikia contributor mainly because he didn't like that [[Super Mario Bros 2010]] didn't follow the storyline and gameplay of Super Mario Bros. ==Story== [[Mario]] and [[Luigi]] are in Brooklyn at their Mario Bros Plumbing place. Then they get a call from a lady that needed plumbing help on a drain. The Mario Bros came to her house and started working on it then all of a sudden they get sucked down through a warp pipe into the Mushroom Kingdom. Meanwhile [[King Koopa]] cornered [[Princess Peach]] and [[Toad]] on a cliff ready to kidnap them. Then the Mario Brothers came barreling out of a pipe and knocked a bunch of [[Koopa Troopa]]s that were in the [[Koopa Pack]]. King Koopa jumped [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:Remakes]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:2015]] [[Category:Wii U Games]]
[[Category:UMG]]

The Koopa Pack was a gang of Koopa Troopa's who worked for [[King Koopa]]. The second in command leader was [[Mouser]]. [[Category:Groups]] [[Category:Mario]] {{delete}}
[[Category:UMG]]

The cheese bridge is one of the twin bridges. It appears in Super Mario World and [[Super Mario RPG: The Quest of Koopa]]. It is made out of cheese. [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Locations]] [[Category:Places]] {{delete}}
[[Category:UMG]]

page.title: Super Mario RPG: The Quest of Koopa

revision.text:
{{delete}} Super Mario RPG: The Quest of Koopa is a game realeased on the [[Wii U]] in 2012. It is 3D perspective like Super Mario 64, Super Mario Sunshine, Super Mario Galaxy, and Super Mario Galaxy 2. It is considered to be in the Super Mario Series and it takes place on the timeline soon before the events of New Super Mario Bros Wii.
==Plot==
The Mushroom King invites [[Mario]] to his birthday festival. While on the way Mario finds Master Luma on the ground. He says he was napping on the Comet Observatory and woke up in the Mushroom Kingdom. Master Luma warp into Mario's cap. When Mario arrives at Peach's castle he see's [[Bowser Jr]] and his airships attacking. [[Peach]] is in the main one. Bowser Jr said with a sinister grin on his face "Hee Hee Hee!!!!!! Ha Ha Ha!!!!!!!! Your to late Mario. I stole all the Presents and I am helping my dad take over not only the [[Mushroom Kingdom]] but Dinosaur Land too. He has the power of the stars and you don't stand a chance! So long you stupid Plumber!" Bowser Jr's airships lifts up Peach's Castle and fly away. A Koopa Troopa says "Quick! Jump in the portal and it will take you to Dinosaur Land. There Mario travels through the first Level called The Gateway to Dinosaur Land. Mario battles a giant Goomba and finds the first power star. That takes him to King Koopa's Doomship. [[King Koopa]] (Super Mario Bros. Super Show!)]] "Mario I know we have been enemies since the Super Mario Bros Super Show but we have too team up to defeat my cousin [[Bowser]] and his bratty son [[Bowser Jr.]]. They attacked this Doomship with their airships and stole our power stars. See that's our fuel. Without it were stranded here. Thanks for bringing this Power Star. Wait if you have the trust of Master Luma say maybe you can help us collect the Power Stars and Grand Stars. Many of my Koopa Pack members will help you along your way. You can talk too them and ask for help. Make sure you don't confuse them with the Koopa Troopa's that work for Bowser. What are you waiting for?! Don't just stand there, MOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" During the journey Mario collects a Power Star at the end of each level allowing the Doomship to advane and move farther. He collects a grand star after each world. The end of each World is a Castle where a boss is battled after traveling through. Here are the Worlds.
==World 1 Yoshi's Island==
The Island where Mario unlocks Yoshi. It has a lot of plants and animals that Yoshi eats. The World Castle Boss is [[Dark Yoshi]]. ==World 2 Donut Land==
A world of Donuts. The World Castle Boss is [[King Donut]].
==World 3 The Twin Bridges==
The Cheese and Butter Bridges. The World Castle Boss is [[The Stinky Cheese Man]].
==World 4 Cookie Mountain==
A mountain of cookies. The World Castle Boss is [[ The Cookie King]].
==World 5 The Forest of Illusion==
An enchanted forest. The World Castle Boss is [[King Boo]].
==World 6 The Valley of Bowser==
The Creepy Cave that Bowser named after himself. The World Castle Boss is Bowser Jr
==Bowser Main Castle==
After finding a lot the Power Stars and Grand Stars the Doomship flies out on Dinosuar Land to Bowsers Castle in the volcanic [[DarkLand]] Bowser is battled at first in his Regular size in the "Koopa Clown Car" but after getting deafeated the first time Bowser eats a grand star and grows huge. After getting deafeated the second time he say's "No you have deafeated me. But someday I'll return. Maybe even on Princess Peach's upcoming Birthday next week. Why did you help King Koopa. He is a double crossing cheater. I was tricked into training his 7 children Ludwig, Roy, Morton, Wendy, Lemmy, Iggy and Larry to become criminals because he said I would get over $9000 million as a reward but it was all a lie. You are stupid Mario if you can be tricked into teaming up with your cartoon nemises instead of your video game nemises". Then Bowser sank into the lava. Peach gets out of the cage and say's thank you for not only saving me but saving my Kingdom and Dinosaur Land. Here take this grand star. After collecting the grand star and cellebrating they return to King Koopa's doomship. ==The true final boss== Back on the Doomship King Koopa says "You have found the final grand star. Thank you for helping me with my evil plan to take over the [[Mushroom Kingdom]] and Dinosaur Land. Normally this Doomship runs on oil but to save money I stole the Power Stars from Rosalina's comet observatory. I will use then to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom, Dinosaur Land, The other countries in the Mushroom World, and possibly the Universe. Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha Ha!!!! Then King Koopa locks Peach in a room and throws [[Mario]] off the doomship. Suddenly [[Rosalina]] appears out of nowhere and saves Mario. Mario starts to float. She says "That [[King Koopa]]. I hate him even more then I hate [[Bowser]]. Tricking you like that. Stealing our Power Stars. Seperating me from my precious little one. I even feel sympathy for Bowser after all those years of helping King Koopa gets double crossed. I will help you fight." They return to the doomship. The Koopalings are having a conversation with King Koopa. Ludwig says "King Dad why did you double cross your cousin Bowser. He trained us how to become ultimate criminals." King Koopa says "He was a nuisance to be around back when we were kids. Why shouldn't I?" Then King Koopa ate all the power stars, and grand stars and grows into koopzilla size. Then Mario and Rosalina get into a huge battle with King Koopa. Then when King Koopa is about to step on Mario and Squash him Rosalina says "King Koopa you tricked this innocent man into thinking those power stars were rightfully yours. Your Game shall end!" Rosalina launches magic power from her wand at King Koopa. The green koopa breaks into pieces and gets sucked into a black hole to the Underwhere. Rosalina say's "Thank you Mario for helping me battle this evil King Koopa. Feel Free to visit the bonus world anytime you want too." Then the credits come. A cutscene after the credits show the doomship falling onto Bowser's castle. Bowser said to the Koopalings "Even though King Koopa tricked me I still miss him. In fact I will adopt all of you. I have another villianous plan that is going to happen on Princess Peach's birthday. Maybe you can help me." The koopalings say "Yes King Bowser" Bowser and Bowser Jr say "Yes!" ==Bonus Special World 9 Star Haven== High above the Mushroom Kingdom and even Sky Land up in outer space you can travel down rainbow road, collect more stars, and find the [[Ultimate Treasure of Life and Wishes]]. [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:Role-Playing Games]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:2012]] [[Category:Wii U Games]] [[Category:3D Games]]
[[Category:UMG]]

{}{{WOS}} {{Template:Box |background = red |content = This article is under construction. Please excuse it's informal appearance as it will be completed as soon as possible. Also don't flame me about the timeline because my uncle User:Ultimate Mario Gamer is forcing me to make the timeline and these are HIS ideas not mine}}
==Yoshi's Island== Mario and Luigi were born in 1981. [[Kamek]] the [[Magikoopa]] who was the true evil mastermind behind [[Bowser]] had a vision one night that two Babies named [[Mario]] and [[Luigi]] would cause trouble for Bowser in the future. So he tried to kidnap them. He attacked the stork who was delivering them but missed [[Baby Mario]]. Baby Mario landed on [[Yoshi]]'s back. Yoshi helped save the stork and [[Baby Luigi]] from Kamek.. ==Yoshi's Island DS (Yoshi's Island 2)== Bowser decided to travel back in time to 1984 to steal the stars from the star children so he could conquer the universe. The Yoshi's decide to help Baby Mario, Baby Luigi, [[Baby Peach]], [[Baby Wario]], [[Baby Waluigi]], and [[Baby Donkey Kong]]. Even [[Baby Bowser]] decides to help defeat his future self. ==Mario and Luigi Partners in time (past portion)== In 1985, [[Princess Shroob]] ordered an invasion on the [[Mushroom Kingdom]]. [[Mario]] and [[Luigi]] traveled back in time to defeat the Princess Shroob and rescue Princess Peach. After defeating Princess Shroob it was revealed that she had an older twin sister called [[mariowiki:Elder Princess Shroob|Elder Princess Shroob]] who was trapped. Baby Bowser accidentally helped Elder Princess Shroob escape. After Elder Princess Shroob was defeated, her younger brother [[Prince Shroob]] took over [[Planet Shroob]] ==Yoshi's Story== One day in 1991, 12-year old Bowser decided to get revenge on the Yoshi's. He stole the Super Happy Tree and turned Yoshi's Island into a book. It affected the Adult Yoshi's but it did not affect their hatching offspring who decided to go on an adventure to rescue the Super Happy Tree from Bowser and return Yoshi's Island to normal. ==Mario vs Donkey Kong== One day in 1997, Mario decided to invent and advertise mini mario toys. Donkey Kong Sr (who is currently known as [[Cranky Kong]]) wanted to buy them but they were sold out. So he got angry and kidnapped many mini Mario's as well as 3 [[Toads]] (who Mario thought were kids with weird hats. Mario saved the mini Mario's and the toads. After rescuing them Mario scolded DK Sr who felt bad for stealing the mini Mario's. Mario then realized that DK felt guilty so e gave him a mini Mario. ==Donkey Kong 3== The next day Donkey Kong later causes trouble in [[Stanley the Bugman]]'s garden trying to look for a warp pipe back to the Mushroom World. Stanley fights against DK and then tells his cousin Mario about it. Mario gets angry and captures Donkey Kong. ==Donkey Kong Circus== After capturing DK Mario decided to make him do circus acts like standing on a barrel and juggling falling objects. ==Donkey Kong== DK Sr was fed up with having to do the circus act so he decided to kidnap Mario's girlfriend [[Pauline]] and take her to the top of a construction site. Mario finally saved Pauline. ==Donkey Kong Jr== When DK Sr was recaptured, his 13 year old son Donkey Kong Jr decided to rescue his father from Mario. He successfully managed to do that and they escaped back to [[Donkey Kong Island]]. ==Donkey Kong Game Boy== Donkey Kong Sr and his son decided to kidnap Pauline. Mario however rescued her. ==Wrecking Crew== Mario decided to quit being a carpenter in 1998 and decided to get the job Luigi already had. They wrecked stuff. ==Wrecking Crew 98== They still wrecked stuff. ==Super Mario Brother's Super Show Plumber's Acedemy Backstory== It was August 1st 1999, and the 18-year old Mario brothers were on their first day of college at Plumber's academy. However their professor was [[mariowiki:Sergeant Kooperman|Sergeant Kooperman]] who was really King Koopa in disquise. At that time King Koopa was a criminal in the Mushroom Kingdom planning to overthrow the Toadstool dynasty and conquer the land. He knew of the future plumber heroes of the Mushroom Prophecies that would stop his [[Koopa Revolution]]. So he decided to try to Flunk and eliminate the Mario Brothers. But then after flunking and almost drowning, the Mario Brother's saved Bill Clinton and Vladimir Putin from a flood. They were rewarded and Clinton gave Mario the golden plunger. That same day they graduated and became official Plumbers. ==Super Mario Brother's Super Show Live Action== From August 2nd 1999 to October 15 1999 the Mario Brothers were plumbers living in Brooklyn where they had stupid Pre-Mushroom Kingdom adventures where they plumbed stuff. ==Super Mario Bros Super Show Cartoon Opening Part 1==
On October 15 1999 The Mario Brothers were plumbing a tub that they got sucked down into since the pipe widened. They fell down the pipe. Mario and Luigi shouted "SHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" as they were falling down the pipe.
==Mario Bros Arcade== The Mario Brother's landed in Brooklyn's sewers after falling down the drain. Koopa Troopa's from the Mushroom world were infesting the sewers because King Koopa wanted to conquer Earth. Mario and Luigi thought "Where are these turtles coming from?" They battled the Koopa's as well as Crabs. ==More coming soon== [[Category:Timelines]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Super Mario]]

{{Delete|Bad page.}} ==Super Yoshi Clan== Super Yoshi Clan is a 1 to 4 player game created by a wikia contributor and released on the [[Wii U]] in 2012. It is in the [[Yoshi (series)]]. It has a side view perspective like games in the New Super Mario Bros Series. The graphics are in Wii U graphics. On the [[Super Mario (series)/Chronological Timeline]] it is said to take place when Bowser's an adult but before he invaded the Mushroom Kingdom and met [[Mario]] and [[Luigi]] and after the events of Tetris Atack and Yoshi Touch and Go. Player 1 is green Yoshi but the other 3 players get to chose Red Yoshi, Pink Yoshi, Dark Blue Yoshi, Light Blue Yoshi, Black Yoshi, Brown Yoshi, Purple Yoshi, Yellow Yoshi, Grey Yoshi or Tan Yoshi. You can play as 1 player, 2 player, 3 player or 4 player. ==Story== One beautiful day on [[Yoshi's Island]], [[Chief Yoshi]] is having his birthday party. He invited his friends and [[Dark Yoshi]](who Yoshi didn't know he worked for Bowser yet). Dark Yoshi had a huge present. Yoshi was extremely excited. But when he opened it [[Bowser]] popped out and gobbled up the cake. He then burps fire on the Yoshi's. Then he put down the Bowser flag and claimed the territory as his. Then [[Kamek]] swooped in and kidnapped Chief Yoshi. Yoshi Jr and his friends decided to rescue his father from Bowser and Kamek. They need to travel around the island to collect the 6 missing pieces of [[The Legendary Yoshi Ship]]. There are 6 worlds on Yoshi's island. Each world has 8 levels and the 8th level is the castle where the boss is ==World 1 The Quest Begins== Where the quest begins of course. The World Castle Boss is [[Dark Yoshi]]. ==World 2 Yoshi Beach== The beach that's on the shoreline of Yoshi's Island. The World Castle boss is [[Kammy Koopa]]. ==World 3 the Deep Forest== The deep forest on Yoshi's island. The world castle boss is [[Kamella]]. ==World 4 The Haunted House== One of Wizzardhiemer's haunted houses on Yoshi's Island. The World castle boss is [[Wizardhiemer]]. ==World 5 the Mountain== The mountain in the middle of Yoshi's island. The World Castle boss is [[Kamek Jr]] ==World 6 the Sky== The world on top of the clouds of Yoshi's island. The World Castle Boss is Kamek ==World 7 the Valley of Bowser== After collecting the 6 pieces to the Legendary Yoshi Ship they put the pieces together and sail to the cave known as the Valley of Bowser. The World Castle Boss is Bowser. After defeating him the first time Kamek, Kammy, Kamella, and Wizardhiemer sprinkle magic dust on him that makes him grow humungous. Then the Yoshi's finally defeat him and save Chief Yoshi. Then they return to Yoshi's island. [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:Yoshi]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:UMG]]

Liu is Mario and Luigi's lost brother who get absorbed by a black hole, but survived and finally come out of the black hole alive.
He likes using other people's outfit, and his main outfit is a blue version of Mario's outfit.
== Appearence == Liu wears brown shoes, dark blue pants and light blue suit and light blue hat. His hat has a small white circle with an dark blue "L" in it.
He has black hair, pupil and moustache just like his brothers. {{Character-infobox|image = |descr = Liu|name = Liu Mario|age = Same age of Mario (thinks that have 15 years)|birth = 1 of July|zodiac = Cancer|gender = Male|species = Human|town = Mushroom Kingdom|status = Alive|weapon = Punch, jump, kick, fire flower, other power-ups, some robots|abilities = have a big jump|vulnerable = lava|first_appearance = Super Mario Bros (in-game first appearence)|latest_appearance = Any last Super Mario Game (in-game last appearence)|affiliation = Mushroom Kingdom, Mario Brothers|relations = Daisy (first crush) Rosalina (main crush) Mario and Luigi (brothers)|aliases = Lost Brother (Mario and Luigi) Guy who has been absorbed (Kamek)|voice = Some cool voice}}
== Personality == After coming out of the black hole alive, Liu forget how much old he was, and he thinks is a 15 years old guy.
Because of this fact, Liu easily says "BOREDDDDD" to almost everything when he dont have business to do, instead of doing something usefull.
Also, thinking is a 15 years old, Liu normally acts funny, sometimes imature, sometimes sarcastic but is always happy.
He is also addicted to Electronic things, sometimes bulding machines to do easy work who he could do while he is sleeping or recoloring images.
He also is a bit lazy but is always "OK" for adventures and like the nature. == Relationships ==
=== Mario === Mario is Liu's brother and Liu always go on adventures with Mario.
=== Luigi === Luigi is also Liu's brother and try to help luigi when he needs help. Like in Luigi's Mansion, Liu gives tips to luigi and scare ghosts as well.
=== Princess Peach === Liu already know how to save Peach in a easy way every time she is kidnapped. He normally screams "AGAIN?!" when she get kidnapped. They act friendly together.
== Role In Games == ===Super Mario World=== Liu is an unlockable character in Super Mario World.
After completing the Special Zone, an black hole will appear and Liu will jump away from it.
After that, the black hole will vanish, and will appear a dark blue star from it.
Going to this star will make you switch Mario/Luigi to Liu. And going on this star again will make switch Liu to Mario/Luigi.
===Yoshi's Island Series===
====Yoshi's Island==== As a baby, Liu will be the baby of the second player's Yoshi.
If the game is not in Multiplayer, Baby Liu will be in the same Yoshi who Baby Mario is in.
For the second player mechanic, both players will be in the same screen like in New Super Mario Bros Wii.
====Yoshi's Island DS==== Same thing for Yoshi's Island non-DS game.
==Gallery== <gallery> TinyLiuAndBigLiu.jpg|At left, Liu get hit. At right, Liu after eating a Mushroom in Super Mario World Liu.png|Liu Babyliu.png|Baby Liu as he appears on Yoshi's Island and Yoshi's Island DS </gallery> == Trivia == * The name "Liu" have L as the first word, just like Luigi. * Liu name can be pronunced as "Lil", making his full name as "Lil Mario", who means "Little Mario". * Its unknow how Liu survived inside a black hole, and with energy enough to came out of it still alive. * Liu had a crush on Daisy, but after noticing her behavior Liu started to have a crush on Rosalina. Also for giving Luigi an chance to have a princess. * Baby Liu has no special hability in Yoshi's Island DS. {{joke}}{{Construction}} MK: DC is a preloaded [[Nintendo Matrix]] game. It is comparable to a tutorial of Mario Kart. It has a small collection of character's & courses, with a few new items that will supposedly appear in the upcoming Nintendo Matrix Mario Kart game. It play's out excatly the same as Mario Kart 7, but with a Shop & Story mode. MK: DC is mainly a comedy game, playing on the fact that nobody truly knows if Mario even has a lisence. Nintendo claims that "There was a lot of speculation about Mario's liscence, so we decided to have a bit of fun with that. Really, this isn't a Mario Game, it's a comedy game with Mario in it." ==Game Modes== *Story Mode *Mission Mode *Battle Mode ==Shady Toad's Shop== Shady Toad will sell you items for coins found on tracks. In MK: DC, he mainly sells degrees & Mii Kart Pieces. *Mushroom Degree (Unlocks 1st missions & Story Part 2) 20 Coins *Flower Degree (Unlocks 2nd Missions & Story Part 3, requires Mushroom degree.) 50 Coins *Goomba Degree (Unlocks 3rd Missions & Story Part 4, requires Flower Degree.) 60 Coins *Koopa Degree (Unlocks 4th Missions & Story Part 5, requires Goomba Degree.) 80 Coins *Star Degree (Unlocks 5th Missions & Story Part 6, requires Koopa Degree.) 100 Coins *Unlock Mii as a character. 10 Coins *Mushroom Kart Body. 20 Coins *Mushroom Kart Glider. 20 Coins *Mushroom Kart Wheels. 20 Coins *Goomba Kart Body. 50 Coins *Goomba Kart Glider. 50 Coins *Goomba Kart Wheels. 50 Coins *Koopa Kart Body. 70 Coins *Koopa Kart Glider. 70 Coins *Koopa Kart Wheels. 70 Coins *Star Kart Body. 100 Coins *Star Kart Glider. 100 Coins *Star Kart Wheels. 100 Coins ==Characters== Each character has the standard Kart, & one unique kart. ===Racers=== *[[Mario]] (Medium/ Speed Star) *[[Luigi]] (Medium/ Ghost Vac) *[[Princess Peach|Peach]] (Light/ Royal Kart) *[[Bowser]] (Heavy/ Koopa Fortress) *[[Toad]] (Light/ Mushroom Ranger) *[[Yoshi]] (Light/ Egg Runner) *[[Donkey Kong]] (Heavy/ Banana Barrel) *[[Koopa Troopa]] (Light/ Shell Kart) *[[Boo]] (Light/ Ghost Rider) (Beat All Missions to unlock) *[[Rosalina]] (Medium/ Lunar Luma) (Beat Grand Prix to unlock) *[[Wario]] (Heavy/ Cash Grabber) (Beat Grand Prix with every starter character to unlock) *[[Goomba]] (Light/ Goomba Horde) (Collect 1000 coins to unlock) *[[Dry Bowser]] (Heavy/ Bone Fort) (Unlock all other characters to unlock) *[[Mii]] (Choosable/ Custom Kart) (Buy from Shady Toad for 10 coins) ===NPC's=== *[[Princess Daisy|Daisy]] *[[Shady Toad]] (Shop Owner) *[[Toadsworth]] (Driving Instructor) *[[Fawful]] *[[Bowser Jr.]] ==Tracks== *[[Coconut Mall|Crapnut Mall]] *[[Mario Circuit|Mar.io Circuit]] *[[Toadsworths Driver Course]] *[[Luigi's Mansion]] < for man only *[[Waluigi's Blimp]] *[[Bowser's Castle]] *[[Comet Observatory]] *[[Peach's Castle]] *[[Wuhu Island]] *[[Airship|Airship Ride]] *Mushroom City *[[Fawful's Airship]] *[[Dinosaur Land]] *[http://mariokart.wikia.com/wiki/Peach_Beach Peach Beach] and Teach *[http://mariokart.wikia.com/wiki/Daisy_Cruiser Daisy Cruiser] *Koopa Hell *Mushroom Gorge *Maple Tr33way haxed cour-s ===Battle Tracks=== *Fawful's Generator *[[Dinosaur Land]] *[[Gangplank Galleon (SSBGA)|Gangplank Galleon]] (Link to an SSBGA page.)
==Items== *[[Mushroom]] *[[Fire Flower]] *[[Ice Flower]] (Like Fire Flower, but freezes enemy for short time) *[[Tanooki Suit|Tanooki Leaf]] (Use tail to bat away incoming projectiles) *[[Green Shell]] *[[Red Shell]] *[[Blue Shell]] *[[Bob-Omb]] *[[Boo]] *[[Luma]] (Carries you to second place) *[[POW Block]] *[[Giga Mushroom]] *[[Lightning]] ==Mission Mode== ===1st Set=== #Coconut Mall/ Bowser/ Bump all 5 racers to destroy them! #Luigi's Mansion/ Luigi/ Don't let any ghosts touch you! #Waluigi's Blimp/ Wario/ Collect all 10 coins in 30 seconds! #Comet Observatory/ Mario/ Don't hit any Luma's! #Boss: Petey Pirahna/ Mario/ Ram him when he slips on the ice! ===2nd Set=== #Bowser's Castle/ Peach/ Escape! (Complete 1 lap in under a minute) #Mario Circuit/ Boo/ Scare Toadsworth! (Press the item button to turn invisible for 3 seconds, reappear in front of Toadsworth! #Mushroom City/ Yoshi/ Avoid Traffic! (For 1 minute) #Koopa Cape/ Koopa Troopa/ Stay in the water for 20 seconds! (Green shells are moving everywhere & will knock you ot of the water if you aren't careful!) #Boss: King Boo/ Luigi/ Fire Bob-Ombs when he appears! ===3rd Set=== #Peach Beach/ Peach/ Beat Daisy! #Daisy Cruiser/ Peach/ Get off before the boat sinks! (Complete 1 lap in 1 minute.) #Wuhu Island/ Mario/ Drive, Swim & Glide your way around the island! (Drive around, Swim through the water, drive up the mountain then glide down & come in first place.) #Comet Observatory/ Rosalina/ Collect all 10 Lumas in 1 lap! #Boss: Goomba King/ Yoshi/ Glide into the air & land on him, but watch out for the goombas he throws up! ===4th Set=== #Dinosaur Land/ Yoshi/ Don't get stomped! 1 Minute #Maple Treeway/ Donkey Kong/ Complete 1 Lap without falling! #Mushroom Gorge/ Toad/ Don't fall off! (1 Minute, strong winds!) #Luigi's Mansion/ Bowser/ Complete 1 Lap in 1:30...... in Mirror Mode! #Boss: Mecha Bowser/ Toad/ When he opens his mouth to breath fire, pummel him with Ice Flower Power! ===5th Set=== #Come 1st, 2nd or 3rd in 1 lap of every course/ Wario #Boss: Cosmic Bowser/ (Switchs every time you destroy a Star in the following order: Mario, Luigi, Peach, Toad, Yoshi, Koopa Troopa, Donkey Kong, Boo, Wario, Rosalina, repeat.) Destroy the stars to weaken him, don't let him touch you, & once you destroy all the stars, ram him off the edge, one by one! ==Story Mode== In story mode, You can only Play as any character except for Bowser, Peach & Dry Bowser ===Part 1=== The story begins with all the characters fighting hard in the last track of a tournament. It zooms in on your character. If they come first, they will have just enough points for gold! *1st Race: Mario Circuit: 1 lap Just before you can finish, Toadsworth shows up with a barricade blocking the finish line. He states that none of you have a liscence, & as such ae disqualified until you get your liscence. He then takes you to his driving course. *2nd Race: Toadsworth's Driver Course: Vs. Toadsworth 3 Laps, *3rd Race: Toadsworth's Driver Course: Win without using any items! 3 Laps Toadsworth says that you have basic driving skills, but he can't give you a basic liscence yet, because he's lost all his Mushroom Degrees. ===Part 2=== After buying the Mushroom Degree off Shady Toad, Toadsworth says you are ready for driving in proper locations, but you still cannot race yet because that requires a Goomba Degree or higher. To earn your next degree, you must practice driving in real situations. For starters, you must be able to drive in heavy trafffic. *4th Race: Mushroom City: 1 Lap, Don't crash! *5th Race: Coconut Mall: 3 Laps, Don't smash anything! Now that you can traverse Real situattions, you must learn to control the Glider, aswell as the ability to swim underwater. *6th Race: Wuhu Island: 3 Laps, don't get hit while underwater or fall while gliding! *7th Race: Daisy Cruiser: 3 Laps, same goal as Race 6 After you return to Toadsworth, Princess Peach comes to give you a present, but before she can, Fawful's Airship appears, & Bowser leaps down & kidnaps her! He then drives his kart onto a special platform, but you manage to follow them just in time! *8th Race: Fawful's Airship: 3 Laps, Catch up to bowser & attack him 5 times before the end! Just before you can save Princess Peach, Fawful sneaks up behind you & pushes you off! Toadsworth pilots the Toad Brigade's ship & manages to save you just in time, but Fawful & Bowser get's away. Toadsworth says you tried your best, & have earned the Flower Degree, but Bowser must have took them, because they all disapeared! ===Part 3=== Toadsworth starts to wonder how you manage to get the degrees. Regardless, he tells you that you can practice your skills as you chase down Fawful's Airship. *9th Race: Mushroom Gorge: 3 Laps, complete in 4 minutes or less. *10th Race: Koopa Cape: 2 Laps, complete in 5 minutes or less. Toadsworth tells you that he has located Bowser Jr, who surely can't be far away from his father. *11th Race: Peach Beach: 1 lap, complete in 1:30 or less. The boat you are on is attacked by the Koopa Army, get off before they capture you! *12th Race: Daisy Cruiser: 1 Lap, 3 lives, complete in 2:00 or less! You just manage to get to Dinosaur Island, where Bowser Jr. is hiding out. Find his secret base & stop him fast! You just manage to see him before he runs off. *13th Race: Dinosaur Island: 1 Lap, Don't loose Bowser Jr! Bowser Jr. accidently leads you right too his hideout before confronting you. He grabs his magic brush & jumps into a vamped up kart. *Boss: Bowser Jr. Make him drive into the power generator 5 times! Watch out for his paint attacks! 3 lives. Bowser Jr. Accidently reveals that his Father & Fawful are going to the Comet Observatory so they can steal all the Luma's power. Toadsworth then messages you telling you that Bowser & Fawful are going to the Comet Observatory to steal the power of the Lumas. He then states that since you managed to get through so much, you've earned the Goomba Degree. But, they got chewed up by some Cows from the Moo Moo Farm, so you'll have to find one. ===Part 4=== Toadsworth questions you about where you get the degrees, but finds out nothing. He then tells you that to reach the comet observatory, you'll have to collect the components for the Space Cannon. *14th Race: Dinosaur Land: 2 Laps, collect atleast 20 coins *15th Race: Luigi's Mansion: 2 Laps, collect atleast 30 coins *16th Race: Peach's Castle: 2 Laps, collect atleast 40 coins Toadsworth informs you that the last piece can be bought from Coconut Mall, but it's a very popular item, so you'll have to get in quick! *17th Race: Coconut Mall: 3 Laps, come 1st! When you arrive back at Toadsworths Garage, he tells you that the engine parts still must be found. Before he can tell you where they are, a team of Paratroopas come down & kidnap him. Before you can act to save him, Bowser Swoops down & knocks you out.
You reawaken in Bowser's Castle, above a pit of Lava. He chuckles & Approachs to attack. *Boss: Bowser. 3 lives, push him into the lava 5 times to kill him. Watch out for his fire breath & Shell spin attacks! After Bowser drowns in the lava, A Luma comes with a message from Toadsworth. The Luma exclaims that Toadsworth wanted you to have the Koopa degree...... but the Luma dropped it on his way. ===Part 5=== The Luma asks you where you got the degree, & is disapointed when you tell him nothing. He tells you that the engine parts for the Space Cannon can be found in Luigi's Mansion, Airship Ride & Maple treeway. *18th Race: Luigi's Mansion: Collect all 8 Parts in 2 minutes! *19th Race: Airship Ride: Collect all 8 Parts in 2 minutes! *20th Race: Maple Treeway: Collect all 8 Parts in 2 minutes! Now that you have all the pieces of the engine, you must get it's power source: A Baby Luma. Only one is in the Mushroom Kingdom. *21st Race: Waluigi's Blimp: Ram Waluigi 3 times! The Luma has finished building the Cannon, & just as the baby Luma enters the engine's Heart, Dry Bowser Appears! He's angry, cos, well you know......... you killed him. *Boss: Dry Bowser. 3 Lives. Push him into the cannon until he stays in! (5 Times) Dry Bowser's Bones get blasted everywhere, but the Cannon couldn't take it. The Baby Luma flys away, & your task is over. But there is still 1 last hope.
Before you can take off in Bowser's Clown Car, the Luma comes & tells you that you cannot take off until you get the next degree, which you have earned...... but the Luma left them sitting on the cannon's edge. ===Part 6=== As you finnally take off in the Clown Car, it breaks down just before it can reach the comet observatory, only to land on Fawdul's Airship. *22nd Race: Fawful's Airship: Come 1st Bowser Jr. Stops you in your tracks. He has used Luma magic to bring back Bowser in his Cosmic Form. You must quickly beat them both before you can progress. *Boss: Bowser Jr. & Bowser. 3 Lives. Trick Bowser Jr. into running into Cosmic Bowser's super flames 3 times, then defeat Bowser by hitting each Luma once without Bowser hitting them. You then move on to your final destination: Fawful's Lair. Defeat him quickly to save the day! *Boss: Fawful. 3 Lives. Make Fawful run into the Star Beams before ramming him off the edge 3 times. The day is saved! Rosalina returns you & Peach to the Mushroom Kingdom. Shady Toad escapes custody. Everything is as it should be. But, are you forgeting something? Nope.
Toadsworth frantically searchs for a wait out of his cell in Bowser's Castle. ==Trivia== *Mk: DC is not considered a proper game due to it's ridiculous nature. *Apparenty, MK: DC was not created by Nintendo, but the currently unkown company who is making most of the games for the Nintendo Matrix. **The company is also apparently Independent. page.title: Extreme Super Mario Bros: Brutal Finish

revision.text:
{{joke|dark and gritty Mario}} [[File:Super mario bros artwork mario luigi nintendo wallpaper by lastscionz.jpg|thumb|300px|right]]
Extreme Super Mario Bros: Brutal Finish is a [[Mario (series)|Mario]] movie that came out on August 19, 20XX. It takes place at the end of the Mario games. ==Plot== [[Mario]] and [[Peach]] are clebrating after Mario's recent rescue. They set up a marriage, but [[Bowser]] takes her three days before the marriage, Mario and [[Luigi]] go off to rescue her.
Mario and Luigi are doing fine until a Goomba mob sorrunds them, taking Mario to be stomped on. Luigi tries to rescue him, but a Goomba shoves him away, putting him in a coma. Mario is stomped on, but is still alive. He finds Luigi, and tries to find a 1-up for him.
At the Mushroom Kingdom, a group of Toads try to get over to Bowser's castle, but are brutally beaten into mushrooms by a koopling. He takes them onto his ship, but slips and the mushrooms fall. Mario takes one, and cures Luigi, but the Toads watch in horror and brutally beat him and Luigi.
Luigi and Mario wake up in the clouds, in which Luigi falls and dies. Mario jumps down and finds himself in front of Bowsers castle. He gets in, only to be slugged into the wall. He, barely breathing crawls under Bowser. With his last breaths, he pushes the button which opens a shredder that brutally kills Bowser. Mario passes out.
He wakes up in the hosiptal, and the wedding will have to be post-poned thanks to Mario's recovery. He and Peach get married and bury Luigi. [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Movies]] [[Category:TV]]

{{Joke}} [[File:Emo_Mario_64.png|thumb|320px]] '''Emo Mario 64''' is a PC game in which you play as [[Mario (Emo)|Mario]], who has gone emo after being brainwashed by Bowser. Now Luigi must try to make Mario normal again. It's your job as an emo to shut everyone out, including Luigi. ==Plot== One day, in the Mushroom Kingdom, Mario is fighting some Goombas, when Bowser flies up in his Koopa Clown Car and shoots Mario with a mind control ray. Bowser brainwashes Mario to be emo, thus preventing Mario from caring enough to save Peach. With the Mushroom Kingdom taken over, Luigi tries to save his brother, but Emo Mario escapes. After shaving his mustache off and wearing only black clothes, Emo Mario goes on a quest to avoid his brother Luigi. ==Playable Characters== *Emo Mario ==NPCs== *Luigi *Peach *Bowser *Toad [[Category:Games]] [[Category:PC Games]] [[Category:Platforming Games]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:Mario Parodies]] [[Category:Articles by ElectricMayhem]] [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Mario]]

{{Template:Joke|recolours and cheeky Nando's}}{{Template:Character |image = [[File:cheeky nandos mario.png|200px]] |gender = Male |town = Mushroom Kingdom |status = With the lads |class = Cheeky |weapon = Banter |abilities = Cheekiness |vulnerable = KFC |affiliation = Nando's |relations = [[Cheeky Nando's Luigi|Luigi]] (Lad), [[Cheeky Nando's Toad|Toad]] (Lad), [[Cheeky Nando's Peach|Peach]] (Bae)}} Cheeky Nando's Mario is another form of [[Mario]], after eating at Nando's. ==Appearance== When in Cheeky Nando's mode, Mario wears an orange hat and shirt, with red overalls with grey buttons. The orange colour is to represent the cheekiness of the Nando's, whereas the red cheekily connotes Nando's spicy meals. His hat also has the Nando's logo instead of the standard letter "M". Mario's eyes sometimes change colour and become orange, but only when his meal at Nando's was extra cheeky. ==Personality== It is a well known fact that Nando's provide top quality cheeky chicken, after eating a Nando's, Mario can get a bit cheeky. When with his friends, Cheeky Nando's Mario is known to have top class banter. ==Abilities== After eating a piping hot plate of good old Cheeky Nando's, Mario has the ability to create top class banter, which will create a good relationship with the enemies, meaning that they join Mario's side and let him past instead of trying to kill him. What a lad. ==Appearances== Feel free to release the cheekiness into your own games, and then add them here: ===[[Super Fighting World]]===
Cheeky Nando's Mario appears as an assist in Super Fighting World. He follows the opponents and makes them laugh uncontrollably, providing the summoner a chance to attack. ==Gallery==

Cheeky smash.png|[[Super Fighting World]] </gallery> [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Recoloured Characters]] [[Category:UltimateMogwai's Things]] [[Category:UltimateMogwai's Characters]] [[Category:Free to use Characters]] [[Category:Fan Characters]] [[Category:Mario's Power-Ups]] [[Category:Transformations]] [[Category:Articles with British spelling]] [[Category:Nando's]] [[Category:Mario's Brothers]] [[Category:Recolors]] [[Category:OCs]]

{{Joke Game}}{{ML}}{{Game-infobox |title=[[File:Zuper_Zario_Zrothers_Zxtreme.png|250px]] |image= |descr= |developer=[[File:CometGamingSeal.png|180px]] |publisher=[[File:CometGamingSeal.png|180px]] |released=2014 |genre=Platforming |modes=Single player, multiplayer |ratings=E |platforms=[[Nintendo Comet]] |media=Comet Disc |series= |predecessor= |successor= }}'''''{{PAGENAME}}''''' is a platforming title for the [[Nintendo Comet]]. It features the debut of two new ''Mario'' characters, [[Zario]] and [[Zoshi]]. The game features Zario going on a quest to face Zowser after he has infested Zarland with rabid cows. Lucky, Zoshi is able to help Zario tame the rabid cows to assist them in their adventure. ==Story== Zowser, up to his usual shenanigans, decides to induce his wrath on Zarland for no reason. He goes to his laboratory and implants the rabies virus into a cow. He then rapidly regenerates it, causing an army of rabid cows to appear. He sends them off to Zarland. Meanwhile, Zario is off on a mountainside walk when the rabid cows reach him. He touches the mountain, triggering an avalanche, annihilating some cows. He then hops on a cow and uses his powers of seduction to lure it into his control. He is able to flee, but not before the rabid cows destroy the mountain, causing an implosion which nearly kills Zario. He is left to die, but luckily Zoshi manages to rescue him. By that time, the cows have spread across all of Zarland and the two must defeat them all. ==Gameplay== The game is a 2D platformer, similar to the ''New Super Mario Bros.'' series. Individual aspects of the game are rather similar to the 3D ''Mario'' games, such as ''Super Mario Galaxy'', with special types of jumps and abilities Zario or Zoshi can perform. Levels are much more detailed than simply the world's theme with a few add-ons, having some interesting gameplay features. These include riding rabid cows, which have a variety of functions within the game.
==Characters== ===Playable=== *[[Zario]] *[[Zoshi]] ===Bosses=== *[[Zowser]] ==Levels== ==Gallery== <gallery> Zario.png|Zario's artwork Zowser.png|Zowser's artwork Zoshi.png|Zoshi's artwork for the game. Rabid Cow.png|Rabid cow's artwork Zuper Zario Zrothers Zxtreme.png|The logo. </gallery> {{CometGaming}} [[Category:Fan Games]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:Lumoshi's Games]] [[Category:Zuper Zario Zrothers Zxtreme (series)]] [[Category:Nintendo Comet Games]]

{{Construction}} {{Template:Joke|all the "long lost brother/cousin/father/mother/child/relative/whatever of Mario and Luigi" characters}}
{{Character-infobox |image = [[File:Eyerio.png]] |name = Eyerio |age = <insert mario's age here> |birth = 32nd of August |zodiac = Satan |gender = polygenderfluid who eyedentifies as a light bulb |species = Decaclops |town = Mushroom Kingdom |first_appearance = Super Eyerio World |status = who knows if he even counts as a living thing |relations = Mario (long lost brother)
Luigi (long lost sister)
Zario (Fiance) |ethnicity = Supposedly Italian|descr = Eyerio jumping to squish {{Username}}|class = Satanic |weapon = {{Username}} |element = poison |vulnerable = Zario's Love |latest_appearance = unknown ATM |abilities = Radioactivity |affiliation = Space |aliases = who |voice = {{Username}}}} Eyerio is a radioactive being that is very complex, but is absolutely fabulous. ==Description== ===Biography=== {{quote|What the fuck is this|Himself|after seeing {{Username}}}} Eyerio is a decaclops who is purple for only satan knows why. He isn't even born on a date allowed on Earth, he was born during a rip in space time, and lost there for several years. He became so radioactive that the first person he interacted with, Luigi. Unfortunately, he lost the amount to do this after Luigi became a girl. He has so many eyes that he can see much more of the visible spectrum than normal humans, but still not all colors. He went on a spaceship on a journey to find others like him. Currently, he has only found one, [[Zario]], and they are now in a homosexual relationship as they travel across galaxies searching for more, and are currently engaged. Other than Zario, he has found no one like himself. ===Physical=== {{Quote|Finally, I found another like me|Himself|meeting Zario}} Eyerio is a human of average size and height. Due to mutation, his skin has been transformed to purple. He wears purple shoes, a pruple shirt and hat, and lime turquoise overalls. His eyes are bright green. He has grown eyes everywhere, and his clothes are made to adjust as such. He looks rather similar to Mario, don't you think?
===Personality=== {{quote|Oh hey, it's {{Username}}. Zario let's kill it and eat it|Himself}} Eyerio believes that he is perfect. As such, he has very high confidence when facing Eyeser, so he cannot be beaten. He can be rather full of himself at times, though. This can lead to situations that can be particularly testing.
==Abilities== He has many abilities, including but not limited to: *Radioactive Mind Blasts *Thunder *Seeing in the dark *Willingly glow in the dark *Become the dark *Burning everything *Jump *Get *And many more!
===Side effects of being near him=== Due to him being radioactive, he causes many side effects to the people around him, mainly these 53:
#Screaming and yelling constantly, never stopping ever and shrieking and growling and generally being a dick. #Being on the Sun. #Becoming the Sun. #Passing the time day after day with menial distractions while your aging body slowly decays and inches it’s way toward death. #Depression. #Acceptance. #Thinking it’s Tuesday when it’s Wednesday. #Rock solid abs. #Emotions. #Punctuating everything you say with clapping. #Teaching Chemistry. #Losing all of your earthly possessions but gaining eternal enlightenment. #Feeling upset when bad things happen to loved ones. #Having more eyes #Giving up soup forever #Standing in a large green room looking at a list of side effects. #Standing up for your beliefs. #Standing still. #Only moving your feet!?!?!?!?! #Incorrect use of punctuation #Understanding exactly what this game is and how it plays and what you do and how you win and then deleting it off your hard drive and doing something else #Playing a video game #Wondering ‘Who?’ #Not wondering ‘Who?’ #Not playing a video game #The ability to smell fear #Thinking you have the ability to smell fear #Being better than other people. #Loving yourself just the way you are. #Not experiencing side effects #Turning that frown all the way down. #Not playing a demo #Repeating yourself #Not playing a demo #Repeating yourself #Locked in bitter struggle with your alter-identity #Repeating yourself #Being Spiderman #Loss of all bodily control #Regining bodily control #Bodily control remaining the same. #Unable to see the colours blue, orange, and red. #Nausea. #Uncontrollable bleeding from every oriface. #Breathing heavily. #Breathing. #Making lots of noise with your big fat mouth. #Vomiting #Eating your vomit #Vomiting your vomit #Stop eating vomit bro #Hey why can’t you respect my decisions it’s my life #It’s my life it’s my life So if you experience any of these, please go to your doctor and explain your contact with Eyerio and/or Zario.
==Gallery== <gallery> EyerioHand.png|Eyerio presenting to zario the giant ring made of spagatti he made for him Eyerioasababy.PNG|Eyerio as a baby </gallery> [[Category:Joke Characters]] [[Category:Mario Characters]][[category:Mario's Brothers]][[Category:Mario]][[Category:OCs]][[Category:Recolors]]

Raphael is [[Mario]] and [[Luigi]]'s long, lost brother that ran away from home only at age of 4. Luigi completely forgot about him and Mario could barely remember. One day, the Mario bros were riding on yoshis to save [[Princess Peach]] once again. They heard slight movement in/near bushes. Luigi got scared and stepped back, Mario was brave and jumped to the bush. "Show Yourself! I will-a-kill you if you don't-a-come out!" Mario yells. Raphael slowly walks out. "M-Mario? Is that actually you bro?" Raphael quietly says. Mario gasps. "Raphael!!! I thought we would never see you again! Or even think of your death! Raphael hugs Mario and jumps on his yoshi. "Alright than, Raphael, Your gonna help-a-us journey and defeat-a-Bowser!" Mario explains happily. And the three bros defeat King [[Bowser]] and Peach meets him. ==Clothes/Extra Info== Raphael wears a light blue shirt and an 'R' labled hat, Dark blue overalls, brown shoes, and white gloves. He is the shortest and smartest mario brother (but Mario still stands the bravest). Raphael's favorite food is pepperoni pizza and pasta.

{{quote|Why does everything always happen to ME?|Alberto}} [[File:AlbertoByArend.png|thumb]] '''Alberto''' is the long time best friend of the [[Mario Bros.]] and is known by [[Luigi]] as being "bad luck", cause he seems to get hurt every time. He is also a year younger than them and is the new main character, along with Sally Yoshi, in the [[Super Mario (series)|Mario series]]. He is also in love with the princess of [[Sunshine Island]] named [[Morina]] and, like [[Mario]] and Luigi, he too has a rival named [[Walberto]]. He lives with his only sweet but strong-willed cousin, [[Alberta]]. ==History == Alberto was a very lonely child in his past, he lost both his parents in a fire at his old house that showed up when a storm came and he was playing outside and has now live with his cousin, Alberta and his aunt ever since, when he was six, he got lost in the city and he felt more lonely then he ever was before and feeling he was useless to everyone who never stop and help him find his aunt, until two boys came up to him and ask him if he was lost and he told them he is lost and don't know how to get home, Alberto told them that no one loved him anymore and he wish his mother and father were still alive, the two boys told him that his aunt and cousin loved him cause they are his only family he had left and they loved him very much with all their hearts, Alberto tells them his name and ask for their name, they were Mario and Luigi who are a year older than him and they where very nice to him, that they became the best of friends. ==Appearance== Alberto wears the same clothes as the Mario Bros, but his shirt and hat are both light blue or cyan and his hat has the letter "A" on it. He slightly taller than Luigi as shown when they stand close to each other.
Being slimmer, thinner and taller, he also wear overalls that like the Mario Bros, but it is more gray like jeans with a blue patch on his keen, and also wears the same brown work shoes.
His eyes are like Mario and Luigi's, big and blue. He also has a big nose and a slightly smooth and messy mustache.
==Interactions with other characters== *'''[[Mario Bros.]]: '''Alberto has know Mario and Luigi for a long time since they where kids. He felt not alone since they came, but like a third bro. to them. He sometimes gets into fights with Luigi, which ends with Alberto getting hit on the head with a hammer. He feels like they are like his brothers he never had. *'''[[Princess Morina]]: '''She is Alberto's love interest and closest friend. Alberto cares deeply for Morina, as she cares for him. *'''[[Walberto]]: '''Alberto's rival. He tries to ruin Alberto's and Morina's love and Alberto's life. *'''[[Sally Yoshi]]:''' She is his best friend. *'''[[Yoshette]]: '''Yoshette saved Alberto's life from the fire when he was a child, and they been best friends ever since. Yoshette is to Alberto like [[Yoshi]] is to Mario and [[Coshi]] is to Luigi.
==Personality== Alberto is sometimes cocky and a bit of an air-head, but he very sweet and a jinx to himself. He always seem to get hurt whenever something goes wrong. He also can speak French and English.
==Powers== Alberto uses the power [[mushroom]]s like the Mario Bros. do. The most favorite is [[Fire Mario|Fire Alberto]]. He shoots blue fire balls. ==Gallery== ===Artwork=== <gallery widths="154"> Alberto.png Alberto2.png Alb.png AlbertoBronze.png|Bronze Alberto AlbertoMK9.png|Alberto in Mario Kart 9 </gallery> ===Sprites=== <gallery> Alberto3.PNG|A Super Star Saga-styled sprite of Alberto made by Randomfrog. </gallery> [[Category:Mario Characters]] [[Category:Allies]] [[Category:Heroes]] [[Category:Characters]] [[Category:Games and characters by SallyGirl]] [[Category:Sidekicks]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Series]] [[Category:Mario Baseball Legends]] [[Category:Mario Heroes]] [[Category:Mario's Brothers]] [[Category:Recolors]] [[Category:OCs]]

{{wos}}{{mature}} {{Construction}} Super Mario Universe is a game realeased on the Wii U and is the successor to Super Mario Galaxy and Super Mario Galaxy 2 and due to the time travel in the game, It is both a sequel and are sequel to the original two galaxy games
==Indtroduction== In the indroduction it explains that Peach dumped Mario for clogging the toilet at Peach's castle with his shit. Although he fixed the clogged toilet since he is a plumber, the bathroom still smelled bad afterward so PEach dumped him. She then married Luigi and that Mario married Prinncess Daisy while Luigi married Princess Peach. It then explained that Luigi and Peach had a daughter who decided to travel back in time using her starship to visit the her mother inthe past. However, suddenly Bowser's fleet of Airships attacked the Starship and stole it's power stars. It then explained that she met with Mario and helped him defeaet Bowsser in Super Mario Galaxy.
Meanwhile at Koopa Castle, Bowser is planning on how to change history to prevent Rosalina from being born in order to prevent her from travelling back in time and stopping his plan in Super Mario Galaxy. He then realizes that in order to prevent Rosalina from being born, he would have to prevent Luigi and Peach from being married so he would need to prevent Peach from dumping Mario. So he started a rumor that it was Toadsworth not Mario who clogged the toilet with shit, so Peach got angry at Toadsworth and ate him.
Therefore this created a reality where Rosalina didn't exist so when Bowser attacked in SUper Mario Galaxy, Mario was not given the spin power to stop him and Bowser created a galactic empire with his galaxy generator.
Meanwhile Toad who was spying at Bowser's castle heard about Bowser's plan so he went to tell Mario about it. However it was too late and Toadworth was eaten. Toad got angry that his grandfather was eaten so he got a mega mushroom and murdered Peach in revenge. He then told Mario about Bowser's plan and realized that murdering Peach would prevent her from being able to have Rosalina as a daughter.
Mario then calls Rosalina on his phone and tells her to drive the starship to the Mushroom Kingdom so that Mario could get on, go back in time, and stop Bowswr from spreading the rumor that Toadsworth clogged the toilet. So she serves and Mario hops on the starship. However Bowser who is told by a Koopa Spy about the Plan, has his airships attack te Starship and blow it up into pieces causing Mario, and Rosalina to fly in different directions.
Mario and Baby Luma end up on a Luma base where there is a Luma who explains that they need to travel through the galaxies were the power stars of Rosalina's starship have been scattered and collect the power stars of Rosalina's starship to put it back together in order to be able to travel back in time. Baby Luma gives Mario the power to spin. They then enter an observatory where they use a launch star to launch to the first galaxy. However Bowser wants to stop Mario from fixing the starship so he sends his minions after him and also to try to prevent him from getting power stars ==Gameplay== There are multiple observatory rooms on he Luma Base but at first originally only one is accessible. When entering an observatory, the player can chose a galaxy to launch to using a launch star and each galaxy has a number of stars to collect. The more stars collected, the more galaxies are unlocked. Upon defeating Bowser Jr, Mario get's a Grand Star and unlocks gets enough stars to get to Bowser's space castle. |Bowser Jr |} ===Bowser's Space Castle=== Upon defeating Bowser Jr, Mario unblocks the final observatory, who's launch star takes him to Bowser's castle where Rosalina has has been kidnapped. The castle is full with all sorts of traps such as fire, lava, and thwomps. After getting through the level, Mario battles Bowser and defeats him and get's the final grand star and frees Rosalina. ===Final Boss=== After Mario gets the final grand star, and frees Rosalina they use the power of the power stars snd grandstars to convert the Luma base into what looked like Rosalina's Starship. They then used the ship and travelled back in time to the Mushroom Kingdom at the time when Bowser went back in time.
To prevent Bowser from spreading rumors that Toadworth clogged the Toilet they try to destroy the time machine and kill Bowser using power ups. Bowser comes out of the machine injured but he grabs Rosalina's wand and uses it to remove the power stars from the starship and absorb all of them making him grow to the size of Godzilla. Mario grabs a mega Mushroom and battles Bowser with his fist and legs. Bowser is eventually defeated and he sneezes out all the power stars making them to back to Rosalina's starship. He idmediatly shrinks back to his normal size and tries to run away but Mega Mario grabs Bowser and eats him.
This causes history to change back to what it was before and Rosalina is born in the figure. This causes her to travel back in time to Super Mario Galaxy and help Mario defeat Bowser in Super Mario Galaxy. ==Enemies== *Green Koopa Troopas *Red Koopa Troopas *Goombas *Pirahna Plants *Octupusus *Lava Monsters *Cheep Cheeps *Moles *Mandibugs *Hammer Bros *Boomerang Bros *Koopatrols *Rex's *Shy Guys *Raptors *Wigglers *Dark Lumas *Slurples *Flip Bugs *Spiny's *Buzzy Beetles *Drybones *Meatballs *Wasps *Snakes *Hawks *Eagles *Boos ==Powerups==

'''Poo Mario''' is Mario after eating a [[Poo Mushroom]]. It allows him to gross out enemies, due to his bad smell. His main power, though, is pooping on enemies. He can also duck and pretend he is just a pile of dog shit on the grass.

And I think that’s where I want to be. I think it’s a very nice place to be. It’s uncomfortable because you’re never going to be an expert in every field. INFORMATION ON THESE AVATARS: These avatars have multiple sources behind them. The first is a overlaying of the Minecraft Exoverse Mod pack logo and an album art of the Arcade Fire album "Reflektor". This pretty remains the same, with the crown in the second one being added onto it (which comes from Kingdom Hearts and is based off the Kingdom Hearts 1.5 cover). The rest of the avatars have a background of something else and that changes a lot. *Third one is Kingdom Hearts 1.5. *Fourth one is King of Fighters XIV. *Fifth one is Adventure Time. *Sixth is Neo Geo Battle Colosseum. *Seventh is a picture of Argon, a gas. *Eighth is Glitch Mob's Love Death Immortality cover. ''Paper Mario: Phelt Finders ''is the last Paper Mario game in the Sticker Star series because it is going downfall, and there are too many shitty Sticker Star 3s here.
== Plot == Bowser steals Peach again, that's just it. Huey returns as Mario's partner because Kersti is annoying as fuck.
== Enemies == (Nintendo decided to add some other basic Mario enemies instead of just Shitty Generic Goombas, Koopa Troopas, Shy Guys, etc) * Goomba * Koopa Troopa * Shy Guy * Cheep Cheep * Cheep Chomp * Dry Bones * Urchin * Spiny * Lakitu * Thwomp * Whomp * Blooper * Sushie * Fire Bubble * Bullet Bill * Bill Blaster * Choppah (the dino enemy in Galaxy 2, not that fucking annoying bug thing in SPM) * Piranha Plant * Spike * Hammer Bro * Fire Bro * Boomerang Bro * Wiggler * Monty Mole * Boo * Chargin Chuck * Scuttlebug * Magikoopa * Topman * Rex * Topmini * Spiky Topman * Spiny Hermit * Octoomba * Fizzlit * Twirlip * Smeech * Flipbug * Cluckboom * Crabber * Digga * Broozer * Flaptack * Amp * Cataquack * Mandibug * Octopus * Undergrunt * Buzzy Beetle * Chain Chomp * Pokey * Swoop * Porcupuffer
== Chapters == (Nintendo even made unique locations instead of Grass, Desert, Water, Forest wIth Poison water, mountain, cloud, ice, and Lava locations)
World 1: Toad City (A city in the plains, surrounded by mountains, their inhabitants are pretty obvious by the name of the location though)
World 2: Roxico (A really rocky place, a desert with really hard sand inhabited by the Skeletons from Super Mario Odyssey)
World 3: Garden Land (A really large garden in the middle of the ocean, inhabited by the Whittles)
World 4: Space Galaxy (It's Outer Space, just with no Squirps, but there are Lumas and Rosalina though)
World 5: New Donk City (The city from Super Mario Odyssey! Humans live there, which is odd though. I am also gonna say Sonic 6 for no reason at all)
World 6: Island Delfino (Welcome back to Super Mario Sunshine. Piantas live in Island Delfino. Prepare to find F.L.U.D.D again)
World 7: Sprixie Kingdom (The Kingdom from Super Mario 3D World inhabited by the Sprixies themselves, obviously, also, Bowser's Place is the next world)
World 8: Bowser's Fortress (Bowser decided to "unique-afy" his Castle a bit, now lava pools are replaced with Dark Matter, Paint has been splattered on the walls, making it look like a total mess, and Bowser got himself his Clown Car now. He didn't have it since Sticker Star)
== Bosses == (The Bosses too, have been "unique-afied) # Larry Koopa # Petey Piranha # Bowser. Jr # Whomp Army (Atleast their personality are unique) # Roy Koopa # Giant Paragoomba (Again, like the Whomp Army, personality is unique) # Shy Guy Captain (Who looks like a regular Shy Guy to avoid originality) # Squizzard (He's back!) # Iggy Koopa # Boom Boom # Kamek # Wendy Koopa # Pom Pom # Dino Piranha # Tarantox # King Kaliente # Bouldergeist # Major Burrows # Topmaniac # Lemmy Koopa # Peewee Piranha # Gooper Blooper # Tower Power Pokey (He's back from Sticker Star with a personality this time) # Gringill # Eely-Mouth # Morton Koopa # Whomp King # Prince Pikante # Bugaboom # King Bob-Omb # Ludwig Koopa # Bowser # Big Broozer # Megaleg # Baron Brrr # Motley Bossblob # Gobblegut # Dry Bowser # Shadow Mario # Kamella # King Boo # Hisstocrat # Mega Paper Bowser
== Trivia == * This is likely the last Paper Mario: Shitty Star I'm gonna make. * It's so original. * "Doge" [[Category:Holy shit]] [[Category:Fuck]] [[Category:Doge]] [[Category:Not shitty]] [[Category:Paper]] [[Category:Mario]] [[Category:Mario Games]] [[Category:What???????????????]] [[Category:The end to Paper Mario, Goodbye..
